pages.text: You can increase your health and your damage. You just need to create or obtain a heart or power crystal. You right click on either crystal type and it'll increase whichever one you used.$(br2)You can double your health (two rows of hearts) and reach up to 30 power levels (that's 30x more than vanilla!) Each heart crystal requires 5 experience levels and grants
you 1 heart. Each power crystal requires 3 experience points, but only grants you 0.5 of a power level.
